botMessages.message: Hi, I am Bob! I am your AI Assistant here to help you. How may I help you, please suggest me.
I am here to help, could you please help me with your registered email ID please?
Can you kindly share the OTP you received on your phone number?
Hi, {!Bob_Customer_Name}. How can I be of service to you today ?
Please select option from the menu.
Thanks for taking the time to chat. To close the conversation, select End Chat.

Thank you for the information. Your return request for the {!Product_response} has been initiated. Our team will arrange a pickup from your address for the damaged item. Once we receive the product, we will process the return and provide you Information.
If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything else, please don't hesitate to ask
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment
Unfortunately, a system error occurred. I'll connect you to an agent who can help.

A product will not be replaced under the following circumstances: - Customers are not happy with the look/sound quality of a defect free product - Physical damage not notified within 24 hours of receiving the product - An electrical surge or any damage ca
Do you want to Exit or continue ? Please select option.

botMessages.message: Hi, {!Bob_Customer_Name}. How can I be of service to you today ???
Please select option from the menu.
Here's your past order status -

Thank you for your choice to replace the {!Product_response}. To complete the replacement process, we will arrange for the pickup of the existing smartwatch from your address. Could you please confirm your current address.
Could you please confirm your current address for the pickup? Once we have your address confirmed, we will initiate the replacement process and provide you with the details of the new shipment.
Thank you for providing your address for the pickup. Your replacement request for the {!Product_response} has been initiated.

Our team will arrange for the pickup of the existing Product on the address {!Customer_Address}. Once we receive the product, we will process the replacement and provide you with the details of the new shipment.
If you have any additional questions or require further assistance, please feel free to ask.
Do you want to continue or End chat
Your product is dispatched on your delivery address in 2 days.
please select any option.
Please select any option
Certainly. To initiate a return request, Select the item(s) you wish to return.
Can you please select a reason for return -
Sure, I can help you with that. Please enter your order number or tracking number to get the latest information on your order.
Thank you for providing the order number. Let me check the status for you. Your order with the order number {!Tracking_number} is currently out for delivery and is expected to arrive by Next 3 days.
Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding this order?

Thank you for the information. Your return request for the {!Product_response_for_step01} has been initiated. Our team will arrange a pickup from your address for the damaged item. Once we receive the product, and return and provide you Information.
If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything else, please don't hesitate to ask Please Write Here........
